name: Deny Freedom
description:
You have a file on 50 inmates on death row. You can save 25. 

If death row inmates were moments from death, and the only way they’ll be able to walk free is if you decided they could, would you let them? Some are guilty, others are completely innocent, but there’s no clear answer for most.

With art and code from PinkLeafSheep, and help with sound design from Rob Park, weigh the cost of human lives without knowing the guilt or innocence of who’s next on the execution list, with multiple endings depending on how many you let live.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/PinkLeafSheep
